title: Feature Request: Connection Count in Folder Title
author: farosch
body_snippet:
It would be nice to be able to display the connection count in the folder title (ideally as an option in the settings) like this:
![powerpnt_2018-10-22_22-30-11](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22905106/47317627-624df400-d64a-11e8-8c46-f54181f3000d.png)

Also, it would be nice to adjust the count based on the current filter:
![powerpnt_2018-10-22_22-35-03](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22905106/47317801-be187d00-d64a-11e8-9b94-91f86c5869f4.png)

iterations.description: Useful feature for users to see folder content size at a glance.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Useful feature for users to see folder content size at a glance.
Approach: Add 'ShowConnectionCount' setting to OptionsAppearancePage. Update ConnectionNameFormatter.FormatName to append child count to folder names if enabled.
